remarks: The pairing of functors ` F : C --> D ` and ` G : C --> D ` is a functor ` <. F , G >. : C --> ( D X. E ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2017.)
statement:
prfcl.p $e |- P = ( F pairF G ) $.
prfcl.t $e |- T = ( D Xc. E ) $.
prfcl.c $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
prfcl.d $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( C Func E ) ) $.
prfcl $p |- ( ph -> P e. ( C Func T ) ) $.
